thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Global Stocks Poised for Weekly Gains

author: Riva Gold
title: Global Stocks Poised for Weekly Gains

organizations.name: global stocks poised for weekly gains european

text:
U.S. stocks rise European stocks up for third straight session Nikkei climbs as Kuroda nominated to new term U.S. stocks wobbled Friday after a Russian organization and several Russian individuals were charged with interfering in the U.S. electoral process.
Despite giving up most of the day’s gains, the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite still remain on pace for their best week in seven years. The Dow Jones Industrial Average was poised for its biggest jump since President Donald Trump’s election.
...
